page.title: United Telephone Company of Eastern Kansas

revisions.rev:
{{Infobox_Company | company_name = United Telephone Company of Eastern Kansas| company_logo = | company_type = [[Private company|Private]] ([[Subsidiary]] of [[CenturyLink]])| company_slogan = | foundation = 1988| location = | key_people = | industry = [[Telecommunications]]| num_employees = | revenue = | parent = [[Sprint Nextel|United/Sprint Nextel]] (1988-2006)
[[Embarq]] (2006-2009)
[[CenturyLink]] (2009-present)| products = [[Plain old telephone service|Local Telephone Service]]| subsid = | homepage = http://embarq.centurylink.com/kansas }} '''United Telephone Company of Eastern Kansas''' is one of several [[CenturyLink]] companies providing local telephone service in [[Kansas]]. Kansas towns that United Telephone of Eastern Kansas serves include [[Sterling, Kansas|Sterling]], [[Lebo, Kansas|Lebo]], [[Gardner, Kansas|Gardner]], and [[Nortonville, Kansas|Nortonville]]. The current company was founded in [[1988]]. ==See also== *[[CenturyLink]] *[[Sprint Nextel]] {{CenturyLink}} [[Category:CenturyLink]] [[Category:Sprint Nextel]] [[Category:Companies established in 1988]] [[Category:Telecommunications companies of the United States]]
